text: Put history homework on personal tasks todo list
response:
Sure, I can help with that. Here is how you can add your homework to the 'Personal Tasks' todo list in Home Assistant:

1. Open Home Assistant (either through your phone app or web interface)
2. Say 'HassListAddItem' followed by the item (your homework) and name of the list (Personal Tasks). So, say 'HassListAddItem Homework Personal Tasks'.

Alternatively, you can also control it via text input if you prefer:

1. In the Home Assistant interface, go to the bottom right corner and click on the text input field.
2. Type 'HassListAddItem Homework Personal Tasks' and press Enter.
